errorDesc: An error occured while retreiving the order. Please try again later.
commandSuccessDesc:
Your order has been placed successfully.
You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
commandFailedDesc:
An error occured while placing your order.
Please try again later.
commandPendingDesc:
Your order is being processed.
Please wait while we finalize it.
commandCanceledDesc:
Your order has been canceled.
You can place a new order whenever you want.
